DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine pronator quadrutus preservation have clinical impact following volar plate fixation
DOC.brief_title: Pronator Quadratus Preservation Following Volar Plate Fixation. RCT
DOC.criteria: Fractures of distal radius with instability (Aofoundation.org) Age between 1575 a√±os Informed consent approval for ethical comitte Previos surgery of the hand, wrist or forearm Inflammatory arthropathy Carpal tunel syndrome Sensory or mixed neuropathy Bilater wrist fracture Functional deficits of ipsilateral extremity Functional deficits of contralateral extremity Complications after surgery with motor deficit Disease that can evolve with neuropathy during study time
